titles.title: Expressing support for designation of the month of September 2009 as "National Atrial Fibrillation Awareness Month" and supporting efforts to educate the public about atrial fibrillation.
Expressing support for designation of the month of September 2009 as "National Atrial Fibrillation Awareness Month" and supporting efforts to educate the public about atrial fibrillation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Expresses support for the designation of National Atrial Fibrillation Awareness Month.
Recognizes the need for additional research into treatment for atrial fibrillation.
